p: Most antifungal agents currently available for the treatment of CADS have several drawbacks. Some antifungal agents have been found to be toxic on long-term application required to resolve the condition.[ 5 6] Furthermore, the fungi develop resistance to these drugs due to their inherent adaptive qualities such as formation of biofilms, expression of different genes, development of efflux pumps, or persistor cells.[ 7 8 9 10 11 12]
